name: Phi Cups 6pcs
description: Special Phi Design cups to make you feel like a proud member of Phi Family. Each ceramic cup is decorated with Phi Logo, black & gold unique design.  It will make you and your clients feel the connection in Phi Community, and add some special touch to your morning coffee.Easy to maintain and very functional. Unique Cups, Artist Made, Elegant Design. Hold coffee, tea or any beverage.
